name: Wisteria: Hurricane Lily
description:
You play as Lily, a young girl living in the small town of Wisteria. On a rainy summer night, she realizes she lost something important to her, and she sets off to search the town for it. In the process, she has significant revelations about herself and her community.

Controls:

  • WASD or arrow keys to move
    • hold down to move faster
  • any key to move through dialogue pages/skip dialogue (I reccomend space or enter)
  • collide with an object to interact with it

Notes:

  • when you run the game in browser, you have to click on it with your mouse first before any of the controls work
  • when in game, follow the roads to move to different areas
